mapper.select: SELECT LOCATION.ID, LOCATION.DESCRIPTION, LOC_HIERARCHY.LEVEL_ID, LOCATION.PARENT_ID FROM LOCATION_HIERARCHY LOC_HIERARCHY INNER JOIN LOCATION LOCATION ON (LOC_HIERARCHY.CHILD_ID = LOCATION.ID) WHERE LOC_HIERARCHY.PARENT_ID = 1 AND LOC_HIERARCHY.LEVEL_ID != 0 ORDER BY LOC_HIERARCHY.LEVEL_ID ASC;
